mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, phone AS phone, advisory_telephone AS advisoryTelephone, hotel_name AS hotelName, receive_time AS receiveTime, return_time AS returnTime, room_num AS roomNum, address AS address, picture_num AS pictureNum, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude, remark_1 AS remark1, remark_2 AS remark2, remark_3 AS remark3, remark_4 AS remark4, status AS status FROM hotel_list WHERE effective = '1'

SELECT hotel_id AS hotelId, service_id AS serviceId, service_remark AS serviceRemark, service_name AS serviceName, service_price As servicePrice, remark_1 AS remark1, remark_2 AS remark2, remark_3 AS remark3, status AS status FROM hotel_service WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND effective = '1'
